GamePage.dontShowFirstGameplay: Don't show for this game next time
GamePage.crashAutobetConfirmText:
Turning Auto Bet on will instantly place a bet for you now, and all subsequent rounds. You may turn this off at any time, but bets placed for the current round may not be cancelled.
  Proceed anyway?
GamePage.autoBetEnabledText: You can now play auto bet by the Funarcade system

ProvablyFairPage.fomrula: fair result = operators input + players input
ProvablyFairPage.overviewHeaderText: Provably Fair: Creating a ‘trust-less’ environment for online gaming
ProvablyFairPage.overviewText1: The underlying concept of provable fairness is that players have the ability to prove and verify that their results are fair and un-manipulated. This is achieved through the use of a commitment scheme and cryptographic hashing.
ProvablyFairPage.overviewText2: The commitment scheme is used to ensure that the player has an influence on all results generated. Cryptographic hashing is used to ensure that the casino also remains honest to this commitment scheme. Both concepts combine to create a casino environment where the user does not have to worry about fraud in game results.
ProvablyFairPage.overviewText3: This is simplified in the following representation:
ProvablyFairPage.overviewText4: Use these links to independently verify game results:
ProvablyFairPage.overviewText6: Client Seeds are entered in the “Plain Text to Compute Hash” field. Server Seeds are entered in the “Secret Key” field. Select the “SHA-256” hash function. For games with Game and Round numbers, input data in the “Plain Text to Compute Hash” field in this format:
ProvablyFairPage.overviewText8: Input the server seed of the current game in the Input field and select input type “Text”. Hash it to get the server seed of the previous game.
ProvablyFairPage.overviewText10: For detailed information about our implementation of Provably Fair principles, please refer to the Provably Fair section in our GitBook: ____________________
ProvablyFairPage.clientSeedText1: You have the option to use a custom Client Seed in all Single Player games.
ProvablyFairPage.clientSeedText2: To use your own Client Seed:
ProvablyFairPage.clientSeedText3: 1. Toggle the 'Use my Client Seed for Single Player games' button
ProvablyFairPage.clientSeedText4: 2. Enter any hash into the input field below
ProvablyFairPage.clientSeedText5: 3. Click the Save Client Seed button
ProvablyFairPage.clientSeedText6: Your saved Client Seed will be used in all your Single Player games.
ProvablyFairPage.clientSeedText7: If this feature is not in use, you will be assigned a random Client Seed.
ProvablyFairPage.clientSeedLabel: Use my Client Seed for Single Player Games
ProvablyFairPage.clientSeedNotUsed: Your custom Client Seed is not in use
ProvablyFairPage.clientSeedNotSaved: Your custom Client Seed is not yet in use - please save Client Seed
ProvablyFairPage.clientSeedUsed: Your custom Client Seed is in use

SettingsPage.profileDes:
To serve you better we ask that you provide identifying documents.
  This will secure your account in cases of account recovery. It
  also helps make sure you receive your gifts or physical rewards
  to the correct location.
SettingsPage.securityDes: Input your new password to reset.
SettingsPage.recommendText: We recommend you to add an email address, for added security through 2FA.
SettingsPage.enable2FAForLoginUsername: Enable 2FA for log in with username
SettingsPage.enablePasswordCheckForEmailChange: Enable password check for email change
SettingsPage.enablePasswordCheckForLinkOrUnLinkDesign: Enable password check for linking / unlinking designated wallet
SettingsPage.linkWalletForLogin: Link a designated wallet for Login
